fn.p: Funding. This work was funded by the UK Medical Research Council (MRC) and the UK Department for International Development (DFID) under the MRC/DFID Concordat agreement (ER; G1000808). MG was supported by the Innovative Medicines Initiative 2 Joint Undertaking (no. 115861)â€”a joint undertaking receives support from the Europeans Union's Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme and Association.
